job_description:
Join our small, fiery team on a mission to usher in the Bitcoin Golden Age.

About Shakepay

date_posted: Shakepay is reimagining financial services to give every Canadian their fair shake, by making it bitcoin-friendly, secure, and rewarding. When Shakepay launched in 2015, it quickly became one of Canada’s fastest-growing financial institutions. Backed by top venture funds having raised $44M+ and trusted by over one million Canadians and counting. People who choose careers at Shakepay are helping shape a future of financial freedom, opportunity, and prosperity for all Canadians.
Senior Software Engineer

Imagine shaking your phone to instantly earn bitcoin. Our customers might think it’s magic, but if you’re reading this you probably know that it’s not (or is it?). It’s not. It’s our stellar dev team that makes it happen. That shaking idea started as a secret easter-egg for our fledgling customer base, and once word got out about it, we suddenly had to deal with service outages from too many people shaking at the same time.

Of course we’ve since solved that problem, and now with over 1,000,000 shakers (aka “customers''), it’s a core part of our identity—not the shaking, but the idea that we came up with something new and exciting in the slow and boring world of financial services. We’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help us reimagine how Canadians build wealth and think about what they can do with their money. Unique ideas and the knowledge and determination to make them a reality: that’s the real magic.
Totally real Shakepay reviews from the future, after you join:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Does Shakepay run on literal magic?
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ I thought magic wasn’t real. Using Shakepay changed my mind.
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Wow, it must’ve taken all 3 genie wishes to make this app!
You will :
<ul>
• Participate in building financial products of the future
• Write high quality, well-tested, production level code
• Participate in code reviews
• Collaborate on setting a tech vision for the company
Must have:
<ul>
• 5+ years working experience as a software developer
• Be comfortable working across the tech stack
• Killer video-call hangout backgrounds
• A healthy resistance to the use of monkey paws
Nice to have:
<ul>
• Experience with Node.js, React-Native, Vue, Postgres, Docker
• Experience with building financial apps
• Some bitcoin knowledge
• The secret password to the Cave of Wonders… we think it’s “open seed phrase” or something like that
Why join:
<ul>
• Competitive Salary - Base salary for this role will be $150,000 to $190,000 with additional equity options & benefits to make up the total compensation package.
• Be part of a groundbreaking journey: you'll live on the frontier of financial innovation. Bitcoin is rewriting the rules, and Shakepay is at the forefront.
• Impact and scale: with only 2% of Canadians on Shakepay, the potential for growth is massive. You can help us bring Shakepay and bitcoin to all Canadians.
• Rewarding benefits: we offer competitive compensation (every shaker owns stock options), benefits (health, dental, paramedical, disability, etc), and generous vacation time.

• Embrace continuous learning: ambitious individuals with an insatiable thirst for knowledge will feel at home. Working at Shakepay means you'll be working in an environment that encourages constant growth and development.
• Get paid in bitcoin: choose to take a percentage of your salary in the hardest, soundest money the world has ever known.
• Work remote: work from anywhere in Canada. If you're in Montreal or Toronto, you can also work from our offices.

We understand that potential can be just as valuable as experience. If you're eager to learn, grow, and contribute to the mission but worry that you may not have the “right” experience, we still want you to apply. We encourage applications from everyone, regardless of background and life experience. We’re firm believers that a little bit of slope makes up for a lot of y-intercept.

Fluency in English is required due to the percentage of English-speaking customers and the nature of our platform, which is available to all Canadians.

job_description:
Join our small, fiery team on a mission to usher in the Bitcoin Golden Age.

About Shakepay

date_posted: Shakepay is on a mission to usher in a Bitcoin golden age, where Canadians have access to Bitcoin-friendly, secure, and rewarding financial services. When Shakepay launched in 2015, it quickly became one of Canada’s fastest-growing financial institutions. Backed by top venture capitalists having raised $44M+ and trusted by over one million Canadians and counting, Shakepay is reimagining banking for the digital age. People who choose careers at Shakepay are helping shape a future of financial inclusion, opportunity, and prosperity for all Canadians.
Head of Treasury

As the Head of Treasury, you will be responsible for managing the company’s funding and inventory position, controlling financial risks and liabilities, and ensuring the availability of the right amount of capital at all times. You will work closely with cross functional teams and you will play a key role in building value creating trading strategies.
You will:
<ul>
• Lead the treasury team and oversee all treasury related initiatives.
• Develop robust crypto trading strategies that aligns with Shakepay’s objectives as well as the macroeconomic environment.
• Continuously monitor the company’s liquidity and ensure the proper allocation of capital at all times.
• Review Shakepay’s exposure to all currencies and maintain an optimal foreign exchange strategy.
• Collaborate with product teams and act as a subject matter expert on all initiatives impacting the flow of funds.
• Oversee the cash management operations to ensure efficient movement of funds.
• Develop and maintain strong relationships with banks and liquidity providers.
• Prepare periodic reports to the board, investors, regulators and other stakeholders from time to time.
Must have
<ul>
• A Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Finance, Political Science or any related program
• Solid experience at a Treasury function at a managerial level
• Excellent written and oral communication skills
• Ability to develop and maintain strong relationships with external partners
• Solid experience trading crypto currencies
• Advanced knowledge and experience with crypto
Nice to have
<ul>
• Considered a thought leader in the industry
• Prior experience at a crypto trading platform
• Proficiency with Fraud, KYC, AML and regulatory requirements in the Canadian Crypto industry
Why join?
<ul>
• Be part of a groundbreaking journey: you'll live on the frontier of financial innovation. Bitcoin is rewriting the rules, and Shakepay is at the forefront.
• Impact and scale: with only 2% of Canadians on Shakepay, the potential for growth is massive. You can help us bring Shakepay and bitcoin to all Canadians.
• Rewarding benefits: we offer competitive compensation (every shaker owns stock options), benefits (health, dental, paramedical, disability, etc), and generous vacation time.

• Embrace continuous learning: ambitious individuals with an insatiable thirst for knowledge will feel at home. Working at Shakepay means you'll be working in an environment that encourages constant growth and development.
• Get paid in bitcoin: choose to take a percentage of your salary in the hardest, soundest money the world has ever known.
• Work remote: work from anywhere in Canada. If you're in Montreal or Toronto, you can also work from our offices.

We understand that potential can be just as valuable as experience. If you're eager to learn, grow, and contribute to the mission but worry that you may not have the “right” experience, we still want you to apply. We encourage applications from everyone, regardless of background and life experience. We’re firm believers that a little bit of slope makes up for a lot of y-intercept.
Please note that while all of our roles are remote, we are a Canadian company and will not be sponsoring visas for this position. You must be eligible to work in Canada to be selected.

About Shakepay

date_posted: Shakepay is reimagining financial services to give every Canadian their fair shake, by making it bitcoin-friendly, secure, and rewarding. When Shakepay launched in 2015, it quickly became one of Canada’s fastest-growing financial institutions. Backed by top venture funds having raised $44M+ and trusted by over one million Canadians and counting. People who choose careers at Shakepay are helping shape a future of financial freedom, opportunity, and prosperity for all Canadians.
Securities Compliance Analyst

As a Securities Compliance Analyst, you will help Shakepay meet its regulatory requirements with an eye on securities laws, rules, regulations, securities regulators, and associated guidance. Shakepay has over 1,000,000 shakers (aka, “customers”) who love Shakepay almost as much as they love bitcoin. We see keeping ourselves protected as keeping them protected. Thoroughness, accuracy, and speed are all critical in the Crypto-Asset space to ensure we’re doing more than what is necessary out of respect for the trust those shakers put in us.
You will
<ul>
• Coordinate with stakeholders to develop and implement compliance controls.
• Assist with the ongoing monitoring and oversight of relevant obligations to ensure compliance with internal compliance standards.
• Assist the Chief Compliance Officer (CCO) in the production, completeness and accuracy of all regulatory reporting, ensuring it follows internal guidelines.
• Ensure that reporting follows internal guidelines, is in accordance with established timelines and proper process.

The job exists to make sure Shakepay is in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations for its business.

Internally: We offer support to each team with their legal questions and requests. Whether it is compliance, privacy, AML, product, contract, the goal is to provide a quick and clear response  resulting in an outcome that is not only legally accurate, but also taking into account the values that make up Shakepay.
Externally: Protect Shakepay and its customers' interests. Work with external vendors and regulators to reach positive business outcomes on legal arrangements.
You will
<ul>
• Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to proactively identify and address potential legal issues and risks.
• Offer strategic legal guidance on all areas of the business including commercial, securities, consumer protection, IP, employment, privacy, marketing, and regulatory.
• Contribute to the development and launch of innovative products and services by providing legal support
• Offer guidance in regulatory compliance, staying on top of changes in laws and regulations related to financial services
• Prepare, draft, review and negotiate commercial contracts and provide legal advice regarding the associated risks
• Liaise with external law firms when necessary to ensure comprehensive legal support and expertise
• Efficiently manage dispute resolution, law enforcement inquiries, and other legal proceedings
• Draft terms and conditions, policies and disclosures ensuring legal compliance and transparency
• Develop and implement streamlined processes to enhance the efficiency of legal workflows
Must have
<ul>
• Bachelor of law degree and/or Juris Doctorate with provincial bar membership
• Minimum of 4 years of experience working in a law firm and/or as in-house counsel in Canada
• Proficient in legal terminology and operations
• Solid understanding of corporate law and commercial law
• Critical thinking and multitasking abilities
• Contract negotiation and drafting skills
• Ability to effectively manage competing priorities and meet tight deadlines
• Strong interpersonal and organizational skills
• Comfortable thriving in a fast-paced culture, with a pragmatic, solution-driven approach
• Creative mindset and the capability to propose alternative solutions to intricate challenges
• Excellent oral and written communication skills in English
Nice to have
<ul>
• Experience in the financial and/or technology industry
• Interest in crypto and new technologies
• Crisis management experience
• Excellent and oral written communication skills in French
Why join?
<ul>
• Be part of a groundbreaking journey: you'll live on the frontier of financial innovation. Bitcoin is rewriting the rules, and Shakepay is at the forefront.
• Impact and scale: with only 2% of Canadians on Shakepay, the potential for growth is massive. You can help us bring Shakepay and bitcoin to all Canadians.
• Rewarding benefits: we offer competitive compensation (every shaker owns stock options), benefits (health, dental, paramedical, disability, etc), and generous vacation time.

• Embrace continuous learning: ambitious individuals with an insatiable thirst for knowledge will feel at home. Working at Shakepay means you'll be working in an environment that encourages constant growth and development.
• Get paid in bitcoin: choose to take a percentage of your salary in the hardest, soundest money the world has ever known.
• Work remote: work from anywhere in Canada. If you're in Montreal or Toronto, you can also work from our offices.

We understand that potential can be just as valuable as experience. If you're eager to learn, grow, and contribute to the mission but worry that you may not have the “right” experience, we still want you to apply. We encourage applications from everyone, regardless of background and life experience. We’re firm believers that a little bit of slope makes up for a lot of y-intercept.

Fluency in English is required due to the percentage of English-speaking customers and the nature of our platform, which is available to all Canadians.

About the role

As the Business Operations Lead, you will collaborate closely with executives and team leads to drive our company roadmap, optimize operational processes, and ensure scalability to accommodate our growth. The ideal candidate will bring forward an impressive track record of leading cross-functional teams and projects, evaluating and prioritizing business opportunities, as well as making time, information, and decision-making more effective across the company.

• Collaborate with other members of the leadership team to define the company's strategic direction and operational priorities
• Promote a culture of continuous improvement and a high standard of performance throughout the company
• Translate strategic goals into actionable plans, ensuring alignment across teams
• Lead the Business Operations team efforts to scale systems, communication, and teams to accommodate growth and drive customer success
Must have
<ul>

• Operational leadership: Strong leadership skills with a history of effectively leading and motivating large cross-functional teams
• Experience scaling operations: Proven experience leading efforts to scale systems, processes, teams, and individuals to accommodate fast growth
• People leader: Experience leading and helping employees become great managers

• Strong communication: Excellent interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills, with the ability to cultivate and maintain strong relationships with internal stakeholders, product teams, and cross-functional leaders

We understand that potential can be just as valuable as experience. We encourage applications from everyone, regardless of background and life experience. We’re firm believers that a little bit of slope makes up for a lot of y-intercept.
Please note that while all of our roles are remote, we are a Canadian company and will not be sponsoring visas for this position. You must be eligible to work in Canada to apply.

As Head of Engineering, you will report to the Chief Technology Officer and lead a growing team of 20+ engineers to build delightful products for all Canadians. We have ambitious goals at Shakepay, and we’re looking for a seasoned leader to help us grow and reimagine financial services to give every Canadian their fair shake.

job_description:
What you’ll do as a Social Media & Community Manager at Syndr:

As a Social Media Manager, you will play a pivotal role in building and maintaining our social media presence, engaging with our community, and driving brand awareness.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • acting as a moderator

  • addressing community inquiries

  • maintaining a content schedule

  • conducting outreach from our official Twitter account

  • fostering protocol partnerships

  • organising meet-ups, podcasts, and AMA sessions across various platforms such as Twitter, Telegram, Discord, TikTok, and LinkedIn

Community Management:

  • Act as a proactive moderator, fostering a positive and engaging community environment across our social media channels.

  • Respond promptly and professionally to community members' queries, concerns, and feedback, providing accurate and helpful information to address their doubts effectively.

Content Strategy and Schedule:

  • Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy aligned with our brand and marketing objectives.

  • Create a content schedule for social media platforms, ensuring a consistent flow of engaging and informative content.

  • Collaborate with the marketing and content creation teams to generate relevant and captivating content that resonates with our target audience.

Outreach and Engagement:

  • Conduct outreach activities from our official Twitter account, engaging with influencers, industry experts, and potential partners.

  • Build and nurture relationships with key individuals and organizations in the crypto community to expand our network and enhance our brand presence.

  • Collaborate with the marketing team to develop effective outreach strategies and campaigns.

Protocol Partnerships:

  • Identify potential partnership opportunities with other protocols and projects in the cryptocurrency ecosystem.

  • Collaborate with the partnership team to initiate discussions, negotiate agreements, and coordinate marketing efforts with partner projects.

  • Leverage social media channels to promote and highlight our partnership initiatives, driving visibility and credibility.

Virtual Event Organization:

  • Organize and coordinate virtual or physical meet-ups, podcasts, and AMA sessions across various platforms such as Twitter, Telegram, Discord, TikTok, and LinkedIn.

  • Work closely with internal teams and external partners to ensure seamless event planning, execution, and promotion.

  • Provide engaging and informative content during events to educate and interact with the community.

✅ Requirements

  • Proven experience in social media management, community management, or related roles within the cryptocurrency or fintech industry.

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to craft engaging and compelling content.

  • In-depth knowledge of cryptocurrency derivatives, options, futures, and perpetual, coupled with a strong passion for the crypto industry.

  • Proficiency in social media platforms, including Twitter, Telegram, Discord, TikTok, and LinkedIn, and a solid understanding of their best practices and audience dynamics.

  • Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage content schedules, partnership initiatives, and event coordination effectively.

  • Creative mindset and the ability to generate innovative ideas for engaging social media campaigns and initiatives.

  • Analytical mindset and proficiency in social media analytics tools to track performance, identify trends, and optimize strategies.

  • Experience in organising & hosting virtual or physical events, such as meet-ups or podcasts, is a plus.

  • Self-motivated team player with the ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

✅ You will stand out if…

  • You have a strong personal presence on social media platforms and a proven track record of building and engaging with your own online community.

  • You possess graphic design skills or have experience working with designers to create visually appealing and impactful social media content.

  • You have experience in utilizing influencer marketing strategies to amplify brand reach and drive community growth.

🤝 Values & How we work?

The entire crypto space doesn't just move fast but is constantly accelerating. It’s hard building a DeFi product — it’s 24/7, 365 days a year, markets do not close, the ground beneath you can shift, assumptions can and do fail & risk of burning out is real.

  • We take our product + brand very seriously.

    • If we see even a small flaw in our product, we always ask ourselves - Why isn't this perfect?

    • All members have perpetual autonomy to fix anything broken that we notice, and we do not wait for someone else to tell us what to do.

  • Take extreme ownership of everything we do

    • If the team fails, everyone fails, so prioritize and execute.

    • We think long-term, set big goals, and communicate with clear directions and goals to achieve them. Everyone must understand not just what they're doing but also why they are doing it.

    • No Egos, lead by example, and mutual accountability.

  • Strive for clear and simple communication - this is easier said than done but communicating the "why" of an issue is equally important as the "what.”

  • All meetings have an agenda, with outcomes clearly defined as tasks and call-to-actions.

  • Prioritize all tasks by - what is more important for our users without compromising on any of the above goals.

What we offer

  • Unique opportunity to work with a small, focused & ambitious team on very interesting projects and get the level of responsibility and ownership that would be unlikely at any other project.

  • Great company culture: informal, non-hierarchical, ambitious, highly professional yet collaborative and entrepreneurial

  • Sense of a Shared Mission

  • Work on the latest technology, equipment, and web3 stack with dedicated budgets

  • Flexible working hours

  • Annual team retreat

  • Competitive compensation

Listed in: Cryptocurrency Jobs, Remote Web3 Jobs, Web3 Crypto Jobs, Non Tech Web3 Jobs, Marketing Crypto Jobs, Community Crypto Jobs, Community Manager Crypto Jobs, Content Web3 Jobs, Social Media Web3 Jobs, Discord Crypto Jobs, DeFi Web3 Jobs, Manager Web3 Jobs, Move Crypto Jobs, Full Time Crypto Jobs.

What you’ll do as a Site Reliability Engineer at Syndr:

  • Focus on monitoring and supporting our production trading applications and infrastructure.

  • Respond quickly to any technical issues affecting users trading on Syndr.

  • Establish themselves as an SRE subject matter expert enabling cross-functional teams to code, build, and ship rapidly.

  • Own critical parts of our software development life cycle, such as building pipelines, testing, and deployment.

  • Be proactive in identifying, proposing, and improving areas of the SDLC.

  • Be accountable for the cloud-native deployment environments across dev, staging, and production.

  • Maintain, secure, and optimize our platform infrastructure to meet our business needs while maintaining high reliability and a target of zero downtime with only pre-planned scheduled maintenance updates.

  • Work with pen-testing and software security audit firms.

✅ Requirements

  • Professional experience in a DevOps/SRE role working directly with engineers

  • Expert knowledge of Linux and Docker

  • Experience working with CI/CD pipelines, including Docker containers, AWS ERC, ECS clusters, Kubernetes, load balancers, etc.

  • 2+ years of professional experience working with a major cloud provider such as AWS or GCP

  • Strong advocate of process automation, orchestration, and infrastructure as code, e.g., Ansible, Salt, Terraform, etc.

  • Strong understanding of how to manage security-hardened and critical production workloads

  • Familiar with basic scripting languages like Bash or Python

What you’ll do as a Marketing Manager at Syndr:

  • Build cost-effecting marketing & growth strategies to acquire and retain high-quality users at scale

  • Build relationships and target sponsorships with firms, KOLs, events, podcasts, and strategic partners

  • Manage budgets and teams across all organic & inorganic channels and community

  • Work with the team to develop, execute and scale a GTM strategy for all products and services of Syndr

  • Work closely with our social media, content, product, and business development teams to align efforts with our roadmap

  • Monitor market trends & competition and manage effective communication and coordination

✅ Requirements

  • 2+ years of experience in marketing management at Consumer/Fintech companies with a focus

  • Experience planning, budgeting, and executing marketing campaigns, acquiring customers at scale, and negotiating sponsorships/deals.

  • You should be a creative and strategic operator with experience building relationships, connecting, and negotiating with people

  • Comfortable taking ownership and a healthy appetite for leading marketing OKRs - deliver results by setting goals and achieving impact at scale

  • Sound business judgment; and strong data-based decision-making capabilities

  • Passion and deep interest for DeFi as well as crypto in general

  • Fluent in English with excellent written & verbal communication skills

✅ You will stand out if you have…

  • Experience building and leading high-performing, high-creativity teams

  • Prior experience in acquiring customers online using industry best practices

  • Prior trading experience(in Traditional markets or crypto/DeFi), with knowledge of derivative products like futures, options, and perpetuals

  • Experience with other non-trading DeFi products like swaps, lending, etc.

🤝 Values & How we work?

The entire crypto space doesn't just move fast but is constantly accelerating. It’s hard building a DeFi product — it’s 24/7, 365 days a year, markets do not close, the ground beneath you can shift, assumptions can and do fail & risk of burning out is real.

  • We take our product + brand very seriously.

    • If we see even a small flaw in our product, we always ask ourselves - Why isn't this perfect?

    • All members have perpetual autonomy to fix anything broken that we notice, and we do not wait for someone else to tell us what to do.

  • Take extreme ownership of everything we do

    • If the team fails, everyone fails, so prioritize and execute.

    • We think long-term, set big goals, and communicate with clear directions and goals to achieve them. Everyone must understand not just what they're doing but also why they are doing it.

    • No Egos, lead by example, and mutual accountability.

  • Strive for clear and simple communication - this is easier said than done but communicating the "why" of an issue is equally important as the "what.”

  • All meetings have an agenda, with outcomes clearly defined as tasks and call-to-actions.

  • Prioritize all tasks by - what is more important for our users without compromising on any of the above goals.

What we Offer

  • Unique opportunity to work with a small, focused & ambitious team on very interesting projects and get the level of responsibility and ownership that would be unlikely at any other project.

  • Great company culture: informal, non-hierarchical, ambitious, highly professional yet collaborative and entrepreneurial

  • Sense of a Shared Mission

  • Work on the latest technology, equipment, and web3 stack with dedicated budgets

  • Flexible working hours

  • Annual team retreat

  • Competitive compensation

Tips for a successful application

  • Do some research: look at our website and social media channels

  • Only apply to us if you are genuinely interested or curious about this role and DeFi space; this is not for someone who is just looking for "a job"

  • If you don't have an obviously matching experience or skills, make sure you state very clearly what you can bring or how your experience is relevant (but note, we do require deep blockchain development expertise)

  • Prepare to be tested on your blockchain knowledge. We do not care as much about your credentials (university or prior employer), but we care a lot about your knowledge and ability to get things done.

What you’ll do as a Graphic designer at Syndr:

  • Create creative assets such as graphics, templates, layouts, and visual standards for marketing activities across multiple channels, including web, social media, product packaging, email campaigns, and more.

  • Producing short videos and other digital media materials that effectively communicate our brand's message.

  • Develop and refine brand assets, including style guides and brand guidelines, to ensure consistent and cohesive visual representation across all marketing materials.

  • Collaborating closely with the team to conceptualize and execute designs that align with our design standards.

  • Juggling multiple projects, while ensuring all work is completed on time and to a high standard.

  • Assisting in scheduling posts and managing social media accounts as needed.

  • Keeping up-to-date with industry developments and tools, and continuously seeking ways to improve your skills and capabilities.

  • Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing and on-brand

  • Proficiency in design software and technologies (such as InDesign, Illustrator, and Photoshop), with a specific requirement for proficiency in Figma.

  • Experience with social media management and post-scheduling tools.

  • Ability to meet deadlines while working on team projects.

  • Strong understanding and interest in the Web3 space is preferred.

What you’ll do as a Fullstack Engineer at Syndr:

  • Develop high-performance trading interfaces using technologies such as JavaScript/TypeScript, Next.js, React, and ChakraUI.

  • Collaborate on building critical frontend components for our platform, ensuring smooth trade execution, order matching, risk management, settlements, and data analytics.

  • Own the frontend architecture and implementation, adhering to industry best practices and standards.

  • Closely work with Product, Design, and engineering teams to turn concepts into reality..

  • experience designing and building large-scale front-end applications.

  • Have in-depth knowledge and experience in measuring application performance and tweaking code to deliver a high-quality user experience.

  • Extensive knowledge of CSS and JS methods for providing performance visual effects and keeping the frame rate above 30fps at all times

Today

  • Be comfortable working under tight timelines to deliver critical business solutions, tooling, and analytics

✅ Requirements

  • 4+ years of professional experience in frontend development with expertise in JavaScript/TypeScript, Next.js, React, and ChakraUI.

  • Proficiency in creating responsive design systems from scratch.

  • Strong knowledge of frontend technologies and frameworks.

  • Experience with SQL-based databases.

  • Familiarity with building, securing, scaling, documenting, and deploying APIs.

  • Ability to thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

  • Understanding of microservices architecture.

  • Experience with tools such as Jupyter Notebooks, Postman, and Postgres.

  • Strong mathematical, statistical, and problem-solving skills.

✅ You will stand out if you have…

  • Proficiency in frontend development with Go programming language.

  • Familiarity with Web3 libraries, including ethers/web3py, for blockchain integration.

  • Experience implementing and analyzing A/B tests to optimize user experiences.

  • Prior involvement in financial services, whether in Traditional Finance (TradFi), Cryptocurrency, or Decentralized Finance (DeFi).

  • Understanding of derivative products such as futures, options, and perpetuals within trading environments.

  • Previous contributions to the development of trading systems and infrastructure, enhancing frontend components for better performance and usability.

What you’ll do as a Business Development Manager at Syndr:

As a BD Manager, you will play a crucial role in driving the growth of Syndr in Korea. Your responsibilities will include working towards driving platform growth via user onboarding and acquisition, partnerships, industry networking and relationship development. You will be responsible for expanding our user base, fostering strategic relationships, and driving business opportunities to propel our platform's success.

Responsibilities:

User Acquisition and Onboarding:

  • Identify and build relationships with local KOLs/influencers/communities, projects and other potential partners to promote Syndr in the local market to achieve user and trading volume growth.

  • As a representative of Syndr, to maintain good relationships with KOLs and marketing channels to achieve long-term cooperation

  • Be responsible for the execution and performance of KOL marketing strategy, track and analyze channel cooperation results and make adjustments to ensure optimal performance and maximum ROI.

  • Keep abreast of local industry developments, trends and competitor movements and strategize corresponding actions

  • Proactively reach out to retail and institutional traders, educate them about our platform's features and benefits, and onboard them as users.

  • Identify and target potential clients, including individual traders, trading firms, hedge funds, and other financial institutions, to expand our user base.

Partnership Development:

  • Identify and establish partnerships with leading trading and educational communities, forums, and platforms to enhance our brand presence and drive user acquisition.

  • Collaborate with marketing and product teams to develop joint marketing initiatives, promotional campaigns, and educational materials to support partnerships.

Industry Networking:

  • Attend crypto meetups, conferences, and industry events to represent our exchange, network with industry professionals, and stay updated on the latest market trends and developments.

  • Identify potential business opportunities, strategic collaborations, and industry partnerships through networking and relationship building.

Relationship Management:

  • Nurture and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including traders, industry influencers, trading communities, and potential partners.

  • Collaborate with internal teams, such as marketing, product, and operations, to ensure effective communication and alignment of strategies to drive business growth.

Market Research and Analysis:

  • Conduct market research and analysis to identify new market segments, competitive landscape, and potential growth opportunities.

  • Stay updated on industry regulations, market dynamics, and emerging trends to provide strategic insights and recommendations for business development initiatives.

✅ Requirements

  • University graduate with strong experience in business development, partnerships, or growth functions within a tech/crypto/startup

  • In-depth knowledge of affiliate marketing in the industry

  • You must be based out of South Korea, preferably in Seoul

  • Experience with a wide range of growth/business development topics; you don’t need to have experience with all, but should be able to figure any out

  • Track record of creating a tangible impact on key metrics, and be ready to give examples

  • Experience negotiating and managing partnership agreements and contracts.

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and partners.

  • Excellent problem-solving skills - you should be able to think through solutions from first principles and find solutions

  • Excellent organizational skills - you are known for tracking tasks (big and small), making sure nothing falls between the cracks, and everyone is informed

  • Entrepreneur/ownership mentality - thinking big, taking calculated risks, driven by market feedback, willingness to work extended hours and do whatever it takes

  • Exceptional networking skills and the ability to represent Syndr professionally at industry events and engage with key stakeholders.

  • Flexibility to travel and attend meetups, conferences, and events as required.

✅ You will stand out if you have …

  • Understanding of DeFi protocols, Trading, and the crypto industry

  • Willingness, aptitude and curiosity to understand the fundamentals of blockchain technologies and DeFi trading

  • Experience working at a crypto exchange(CeX/DeX)

  • You have prior trading experience(in Traditional markets or crypto/DeFi), with knowledge of derivative products like futures, options, and perpetuals

Tips for a successful application

  • Do some research: look at our website and social media channels

  • Only apply to us if you are genuinely interested or curious about this role and DeFi space; this is not for someone who is just looking for "a job"

Metaschool produces courses for devs to build, ship, and learn Web3.We’re a decentralized, remote-first company with teammates based in Singapore, India and Pakistan. We are divided by borders, but our common mission to help developers build and flourish in the web3 ecosystem has brought us very close.Our Core Values:🏗 Buidl dope shit! - We care about what you have built, not your degrees or FAANG experience.🌈 Stay weird - Own yourself, be yourself! Diversity is our strength!🏔 Improve daily - Daily efforts compound. Don’t underestimate them.☝ Developers come first - We are building for devs. Put them first, always!📝 Learners for life - Leave your ego outside, learn whenever you can.🤝 Collaborate to win - If you want to go far, collaborate and go with a team.About the Role:Metaschool is launching a Web3 DevRel fellowship for developers in Dubai looking to breaking into web3 as DevRel. Becoming a DevRel requires passion, obsession and relentless giving attitude. You can read more about what makes a DevRel here. But, we want to tell you that you are not alone in this journey. There are thousands of others who want to take the same journey as you and we want to bring them all together.This is a 3 months program with an opportunity to find full time employment with Metaschool or our partner organizations based on growth, learning and performance!We are starting this fellowship program to help students and fresh graduates with Developer background to help them break into DevRel.Working together means transparency, accountability, learning and faster progress.So are you in?Who can join this program?This program is open for anyone looking to break into DevRel but there are some basic fundamental things you need to have to get selected.

  1. You are passionate about Web3!
  2. You can code
  3. You have a spike in at least one of the following:
    • Great Communication — you can break down complex concepts into simple words
    • Super Connecter — you like to bring people together and help them win
    • Relentless Giver, you want to give, support and uplift and find joy in that
    • Independent Problem Solver, you can debug, test and solve issues on her own
At least one of the above is good but more than 1 means you are already close to your goal of becoming a DevRel.What will you get?🔮 (100s of) DevRels following the same journey as you🔮 Lead a chapter in your university or city to kickstart!🔮 Organize workshops to learn and perfect your pitch!🔮 Cool swag and Metacoin Airdrop (launching soon)!🔮 Discord badge and roleWe are committed to diversity and would love to see any individual (irrespective of their gender, location etc) apply for this program and learn alongside us.If you are serious about this opportunity and want to learn, build and ship alongside other DevRels apply for the program.

Join the Mataschool team as a Sales Account Executive, where you can fuel growth and innovation!Role Overview:As a Sales Account Executive, you'll be the driving force behind forging strong B2B connections. You'll leverage your expertise to identify potential clients, nurture relationships, and lead impactful conversations aligned with our offerings. Managing the entire sales process, from initial contact to deal closure, you'll employ your skills in guiding prospects, understanding needs, and tailoring solutions for successful outcomes.Key Responsibilities:

  • B2B Relationship Building: Foster robust B2B connections by identifying potential clients, nurturing relationships, and leading meaningful conversations that align with our offerings.
  • Full Sales Cycle Ownership: Guide prospects through the entire sales journey, from initial contact to deal closure, showcasing your ability to understand client requirements, articulate value propositions, and negotiate win-win agreements.
  • Proven Deal Closing: Highlight your track record of successfully sealing deals ranging from $10K to $100K, demonstrating your understanding of client needs and negotiation skills.
Additional Skills (Preferred):
  • Web3 Sales Exposure: Familiarity with Web3 sales landscape is advantageous, positioning you as a more effective advocate for our tech-driven solutions.
Experience:
  • 1 to 4 Years: Your adaptability, drive, and determination to excel in tech sales matter more than the number of years you've spent in the field.
What We Offer:
  • Innovative Environment: Join a team that embraces cutting-edge technology and creative solutions, allowing you to continually expand your skill set.
  • Growth Opportunities: Access resources, training, and mentorship to refine your skills and take on new challenges.
  • Impactful Role: Shape the tech landscape and transform business interactions with technology, with your success stories integral to our journey.
Perks:At Metaschool, you will have exposure to product, business, growth, technology and everything in between. Additionally, you will get:🔮 Competitive Salary🔮 Generous Equity🔮 Health Insurance🔮 Paid Time off🔮 Workstation Allowance🔮 Multiple tech subscription(s) to make your life easier🔮 And an amazing bunch of weird frens!!If you're passionate about building B2B relationships, driving tech sales, and making an impact, the Sales Account Executive role at Mataschool is your opportunity. Join us in the journey of growth and innovation!

job_title: Developer Relations and Community Specialist- Singapore
job_description:
Metaschool produces courses for devs to build, ship, and learn Web3.We’re a decentralized, remote-first company with teammates based in Singapore, India and Pakistan. We are divided by borders, but our common mission to help developers build and flourish in the web3 ecosystem has brought us very close.Our Core Values:🏗 Buidl dope shit! - We care about what you have built, not your degrees or FAANG experience.🌈 Stay weird -  Own yourself, be yourself! Diversity is our strength!🏔 Improve daily - Daily efforts compound. Don’t underestimate them.☝ Developers come first - We are building for devs. Put them first, always!📝 Learners for life - Leave your ego outside, learn whenever you can.🤝 Collaborate to win - If you want to go far, collaborate and go with a team.Role Overview: Do you have a passion for empowering developers and fostering vibrant communities? Join Metaschool in a pivotal role where you'll shape our connection with developers across the Asia Pacific region. As a catalyst for building relationships and driving community engagement, you'll be at the forefront of nurturing the decentralized internet pioneers.At Metaschool, our mission revolves around empowering developers, and this role is essential in ensuring our commitment to their needs. As our Developer Relations & Community Specialist for the Asia Pacific region, you'll not only lead community partnerships but also cultivate and foster relationships with developers. Your work will play a vital role in making Metaschool a central hub for aspiring decentralized internet trailblazers.Responsibilities:

  • Community Engagement: Identify, partner with, and onboard developers through diverse offline and online communities across the Asia Pacific region. Organize activities that keep them actively engaged.
  • Event Collaboration: Collaborate on offline and online events, inviting developers from the region to collaborate and contribute to partner projects.
  • Knowledge Sharing: Curate live sessions via platforms like Zoom or other suitable platforms, educating developers about the world of web3.
  • Content Creation: Create engaging content related to web3 and blockchain, fostering discussions and learning on our social channels.
  • Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong professional relationships with developer communities, individuals, and organizations interested in web3 training.
  • Qualitative & Quantitative Success: Drive success through measurable outcomes, aligning with KPIs and focusing on community growth.
Requirements:
  • Developer Passion: You may not be a developer on paper, but you understand the developer mindset and their needs.
  • Web3 & Decentralization Enthusiasm: Deep understanding of the web3 landscape and its decentralized concepts.
  • Community Advocate: Passion for community building, possibly with an existing following within the developer ecosystem.
  • KPI-Driven: Ability to achieve goals quantitatively and contribute to strategic success.
  • Experience: Over 3 years in a similar role, with at least 1 year in the web3 space.
  • Language Skills: Proficient in English and other languages relevant to the Asia Pacific region.
  • Content & Social Media: Proficiency in content creation and effective social media strategies.
  • Collaborative Spirit: Collaborate with engineering and growth teams to enhance customer experiences.
  • Startup Enthusiasm: Thrive in a startup environment, embracing innovation and agility.
Perks:At Metaschool, you will have exposure to product, business, growth, technology and everything in between. Additionally, you will get:🔮 Competitive Salary🔮 Generous Equity🔮 Health Insurance🔮 Paid Time off🔮 Workstation Allowance🔮 Multiple tech subscription(s) to make your life easier🔮 And an amazing bunch of weird frens!!If you're excited about building vibrant developer communities and driving the decentralized internet revolution across the Asia Pacific region, Metaschool offers an opportunity to be at the forefront of this dynamic journey. Join us to connect, engage, and empower developers in Asia Pacific.

You'll be working with our tech stack that includes Next.js, HTML Tailwind, and Laravel. Your main goal will be to build and maintain high-quality web applications. Knowing React.js is crucial for this role, as it's a key part of our development process.Responsibilities:

  • Build and maintain web applications using Next.js, HTML Tailwind, and Laravel.
  • Write clean and efficient code.
  • Combine user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic. Ensure the entire application is robust and easy to manage.
  • Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges.
  • Stay updated with new updates in our tech stack and related technologies.
Who You Are:
  • You have 4+ years of experience in full-stack development.
  • You have a solid understanding and experience with React.js, as well as familiarity with Next.js, HTML Tailwind, and Laravel.
  • You have a solid understanding of SQL and databases.
  • You're proficient in JavaScript and understand the basics of front-end technologies.
  • You're familiar with code versioning tools like Git.
  • You have a problem-solving attitude and can work both independently and within a team. 
  • Good communication skills to collaborate with team members and other departments.
Perks:At Metaschool, you'll have exposure to all aspects of building a company. Additional perks include:🔮 Competitive salary 🔮 Generous equity 🔮 Health insurance 🔮 Paid time off 🔮 Workstation allowance 🔮 Tech subscriptions 🔮 An amazing team!We can’t wait for you to join our data-driven mission of developer empowerment!

OVERVIEW

Satschain is looking for an experienced, passionate, and creative Social Media Manager to join our dynamic team. As a social media manager, you will be expected to work closely with the Head of Marketing and will be responsible for developing and executing a robust Social Media and communication strategy, creating and managing a content calendar to enhance our online presence and support our marketing efforts. You'll also be expected to have knowledge on campaign architecture, implementation and execution along with industry and design know-hows tailored to the developed social media strategy. This role is a fantastic opportunity to leverage your talents in a supportive and innovative environment. If you possess the required expertise and are excited about being a part of a rapidly growing company, we encourage you to apply today!

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Create and execute a comprehensive social media strategy to promote Satschain and engage the community across platforms such as X (Twitter), Telegram, Discord, Instagram, LinkedIn, and others.
  • Define the most important social media KPIs
  • Plan, create, and schedule engaging content (e.g., posts, images, videos) tailored to each platform, keeping the community informed and involved.
  • Maintain the Brand voice and identity across all channels.
  • Foster and manage a vibrant community by responding to comments, messages, and inquiries in a timely manner, and participating in discussions on relevant topics.
  • Keep up-to-date with the latest trends in Web3, blockchain, and social media to ensure Satschain remains at the forefront of the industry. 
  • Analyse social media metrics to assess the effectiveness of campaigns and adjust strategies through A/B consistently, as needed.
  • Work closely with the Head of marketing, to ensure consistency in messaging and branding across all channels.
  • Plan and execute targeted campaigns to drive user acquisition, engagement, and retention.
  • Identify potential influencers and strategic partners to help expand Satschain’s reach and reputation.
  • Coordinate online events, AMAs, and other promotional activities to keep the community engaged and informed.
  • Stay up to date with the latest social media best practices and technologies.

REQUIREMENTS 

  • Self Starter
  • 1+ years of experience as a Social Media Manager or a similar role
  • Excellent communication and writing skills
  • Passionate about engaging and growing online communities.
  • Solid understanding of all major social media platforms - X (Twitter), Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, Discord, and other social media best practices
  • Ability to analyse social media metrics and derive actionable insights.
  • Excellent knowledge of Understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics
  • Good understanding of social media KPIs
  • Excellent multi-tasking skills
  • Creative thinker and problem-solving skills
  • Strong collaboration skills with a proactive and flexible approach.
  • Good time-management skills
  • Knowledge of Web3 infrastructure and ecosystem is a MUST

We Offer:

  • Competitive salary and benefits
  • Salary in Stable Coins
  • Flexible schedule
  • 100% Remote
  • Exposure to cutting-edge technology
  • A collaborative and inclusive work environment.

job_description:
MetalSwap, an innovative Ethereum-based DeFi protocol, is seeking a highly motivated and skilled Marketing Manager to spearhead our marketing initiatives and contribute significantly to the growth and engagement of our community. This is an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of the crypto and DeFi industry, working on expanding the reach and impact of our protocol and its upcoming products.

About You:

date_posted: You are a dynamic, hands-on marketing professional with at least 4 years of experience in marketing, specifically within the web3, finance, or tech industries. You have a deep understanding of and familiarity with the DeFi, Web3, and EVM environments.Your expertise spans across various facets of marketing, with a particular emphasis on the crypto industry, its culture, and its leading projects. You possess:
<ul>
• Excellent written English skills, with proficiency close to native, and very good spoken English.
• Strong experience in social media management, especially with Twitter, and a proven track record of effectively managing and growing social media platforms.
• Solid background in building and managing online communities, focusing on Discord and Telegram channels.
• Comprehensive knowledge in content planning, SEO, and content marketing strategy to drive engagement and growth.
The Role:

As the Marketing Manager, you will lead the marketing efforts of MetalSwap and its related products and protocols. You will be hands-on, dedicating most of your time to executing marketing strategies with the support of three additional team members. Your responsibilities include:
<ul>

• Growth and management of social and community channels: You'll be the driving force behind our social media and community engagement strategies, responsible for the growth, improvement, and management of these channels.
• Coordinating marketing efforts: Working closely with the team, you'll coordinate efforts to contribute to the protocol's growth, increase DAPP usage, and enhance community engagement.
• Content marketing: Plan, execute, and manage content marketing strategies to boost visibility and engagement.

• Rebranding Process Management: Oversee the rebranding of all branding materials, including logos, color palettes, and style guides. Collaborate with external designers to create logos and SVG graphic asset sets. Prepare comprehensive brand guidelines and manage the public brand folder.
• Community Engagement and Adaptation: Adapt Discord, Telegram, and forum communities to align with the brand and vision. Organize and conduct AMAs to engage with the community effectively.
• Campaign and Promotional Strategy: Plan and execute campaigns on platforms like Galxe, potentially including reward-based initiatives such as airdrops from testnet phases.

• Social Media Strategy: Manage the adaptation of existing social media channels, create new pages as necessary, and define the relationships between these pages. Develop and implement a cohesive editorial plan to ensure consistent messaging across all platforms.
Why MetalSwap?
<ul>
• Impact: Lead marketing for a project at the cutting edge of the DeFi space.
• Community: Engage with an international community of passionate users and contributors.
• Innovation: Work on marketing innovative products that are shaping the future of finance.
• Flexibility: Enjoy the freedom of a fully remote role, working directly for the Swiss Foundation that contributes to MetalSwap.
The Ideal Candidate:

You're not just looking for a job; you're passionate about the Web3 environment and are highly motivated to contribute to its growth. You thrive in fast-paced industries and are committed to staying ahead of the curve. You love working in a hands-on capacity, directly executing tasks that lead to tangible results. Your hard work, dedication, and ability to lead and inspire a team will contribute significantly to MetalSwap's success.
How to Apply:

If you are excited about the opportunity to lead MetalSwap's marketing efforts and believe you have what it takes, we would love to hear from you: please send us an e-mail with “Web3 Application” in the object with your resume, a brief cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role, and any relevant work samples or case studies showcasing your marketing achievements, especially in the crypto or DeFi sectors.

Join us at MetalSwap to lead our marketing into a new era of growth and success. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Listed in: Web3 Jobs, Remote Crypto Jobs, Marketing Crypto Jobs, Community Crypto Jobs, Web3 Web3 Jobs, Social Media Crypto Jobs, Discord Web3 Jobs, DeFi Crypto Jobs, Finance Crypto Jobs, Ethereum Web3 Jobs.

job_description:
As a Security Software Engineer at Privy, you will take on large areas of ownership in Privy’s application and infrastructure security. You’ll work with the entire team to protect our infrastructure product and continue to perfect our security practices at large. Security is the core pillar of our organization and your work will be mission-critical to protect apps that use Privy. You will work to improve threat models, evaluate architectural tradeoffs and build seamless user experiences that are secure by default. Above all, we are building a company together to ship products that users love.

What you'll do

  • Design end-to-end systems that are resilient to attacks from a wide range of threats

  • Iterate on threat models and product architectures against those threat models

  • Build core Privy features, infrastructure, and tooling that advance our security posture and safeguard data and assets for millions of users

  • Proactively assess infrastructure, architecture, privacy, application, and product security and prioritize recommendations and solutions with the team

What we're looking for

  • Strong software engineering skills

  • Deep expertise building secure systems on the web

  • A strong understanding of web, browser and infrastructure security

  • Strong communication and collaboration skills

  • Years of experience working within a team on InfoSec and AppSec practices

  • A balanced perspective on design and architectural tradeoffs across security and product experience

  • Experience with IAM, secrets management, secure access to production, secure CI/CD

Bonus points if you have...

  • Experience with React/Typescript

  • An interest in applied cryptography and cryptosystem design

  • Understanding of blockchain technologies, protocols, exploits, and frameworks

  • Previously helped shape a security program, incident response policy, bug bounty program

Engineering at Privy

Engineering at Privy is not just about writing world-class code. We create software that turns complex technical systems into delightful developer tools. We assemble tried-and-true primitives into intuitive, responsive APIs and beautiful interfaces. We believe in open-source work and transparency with our teammates and users. We encourage each other to think big, run experiments and follow our curiosity so we can build better tooling that lets developers shine and empowers their users.

Privy is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees, regardless of background, identity, or status.

About Subspace:At Subspace, we're at the forefront of merging humanity with artificial intelligence through blockchain technology. As the world’s first digital identity and financial network for both humans and AI, our mission is to forge a global digital root of trust. Built upon our novel blockchain protocol, Subspace is pioneering the autonomous economy—a decentralized ecosystem where natural and artificial entities trust, transact, and collaborate freely. Our technology, initially funded by the US National Science Foundation, is the brainchild of Humaic Labs, a leader in Human-AI cooperation. Join us in our quest to unlock the emergent collective super-intelligence of humanity.Your Role:As the Head of Product, you will spearhead the development and execution of Subspaces' product vision, transforming our groundbreaking technology into accessible, user-centric solutions. Reporting directly to the CTO and working closely with our visionary team, you will lead the charge in shaping Subspace into the premiere network for human and AI collaboration. This is a unique opportunity to influence the future of how humans and AI interact, ensuring safety, authenticity, and cooperation at a global scale.

Responsibilities:

    • Vision to Reality: Collaborate with the CEO and CTO to translate Subspace's ambitious vision into actionable plans, ensuring our product strategy aligns with our mission and market needs.
    • Product Roadmap Leadership: Own the product roadmap, balancing innovation with practical implementation, guided by user needs, technical capabilities, and strategic priorities.
    • Team Management: Build and lead a high-performing team of engineers, designers, and product managers, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and user-centric development.
    • Data-Driven Experimentation: Utilize a blend of data analysis, user feedback, and experimental insights to inform product decisions, ensuring alignment across stakeholders and maximizing product impact.
    • Cross-Functional Synergy: Work closely with engineering, marketing, community, and operations teams to ensure a unified approach to product development and user engagement.
    • Community Collaboration: Engage with the Subspace's community, leveraging insights from users and developers to refine and enhance product offerings.

Requirements:

    • Passion for AI: A strong passion for AI and its applications in improving workflows, with a proactive approach to identifying and implementing AI-driven solutions.
    • Product Experience: 3-5 years in product management, with a significant focus on AI technologies and Web3/ blockchain. A history of successful product launches and lifecycle management in these domains is essential.
    • Blockchain Proficiency: Deep understanding of blockchain technology, especially in decentralized applications (dApps), smart contracts, and the unique challenges and opportunities of the blockchain ecosystem.
    • Leadership: Proven track record of leading product teams in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. Ability to mentor, inspire, and drive high levels of performance and innovation.
    • User-Centric Design: A strong emphasis on user experience and design thinking, with experience in user research, feedback loops, and usability testing.
    • Analytical Mindset: Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to drive decisions based on data, market research, and user feedback.
What We Offer𐄁 The ability to work from anywhere in the world 𐄁 A competitive salary with generous equity and token grants 𐄁 Medical, dental, and vision insurance (US-based only) 𐄁 A unique opportunity to shape the future of the internet𐄁 Team off-sites in various locations around the globe

We are seeking a core protocol engineer to help implement the Subspace Network, a radically decentralized, next-generation blockchain written in Rust, using the Substrate framework. Subspace employs a novel proof-of-storage consensus algorithm and a decoupled execution framework, which allows it to scale far beyond existing blockchains, without sacrificing security or decentralization. Subspace Labs is an early-stage, venture-backed startup with a globally distributed team. To learn more visit our website and read the technical whitepaper.

Your Responsibilities

    • Become a leading contributor and core maintainer of the Subspace Network
    • Implement a series of novel consensus, execution, and scalability proposals
    • Maintain the highest standards of distributed open-source software development including modular design, comprehensive testing, proper documentation, and responsive support.  

Basic Requirements

    • Experience with current blockchain technologies and landscape
    • Theoretical background in distributed systems, such as consensus algorithms, as well as cryptographic fundamentals
    • Strong knowledge of a modern systems programming language, such as Rust, C++, or Go and willing to learn Rust.
    • Experience working with large open-source codebases

Nice to Have

    • Familiarity with the Rust language and its ecosystem
    • Familiarity with Substrate and the Polkadot ecosystem
    • Experience implementing blockchain consensus protocols
    • A passion for decentralized, peer-to-peer systems and Web3 technologies

Benefits

    • A remote work environment with a high degree of autonomy and agency
    • You will play a critical role in implementing a new layer one blockchain
    • Salary and options befitting an early hire at a venture-backed startup

We are seeking a hands-on, AI literate Chief Operating Officer (COO) to join Subspace Labs as a key member of our Leadership Team.Subspace Labs is an early-stage, venture-backed startup pioneering a new category at the intersection of AI and Web3. With our upcoming mainnet launch, the Subspace Network is a radically decentralized, next-generation layer one blockchain powered by an innovative proof-of-archival storage (PoAS) consensus mechanism. Our project serves as a foundation for global collaboration between humans and AI, ushering in a new era of possibilities. Subspace is based on original research funded by the US National Science Foundation.  To learn more, visit our website and read the technical whitepaper.The COO will play a pivotal role in harnessing the transformative power of AI to drive operational excellence and strategic growth. Reporting directly to our CEO and as a key member of our executive team, the COO will drive initiatives to leverage AI technologies across all facets of our business operations.As an early stage startup, we expect this person to lean into creating individual impact , while also fostering a cohesive team culture of innovation and collaboration, ultimately shaping the trajectory of our company's AI-driven journey towards unprecedented success.This position requires a deep understanding of AI and the market landscape, a strong business acumen, and a proven track record of driving innovation in dynamic, startup environment.

    • Spearhead the integration of AI technologies into daily operations, ensuring they align with our strategic objectives and propel us towards the successful launch of our network.

    • Work in tandem with the Head of People to foster an AI-centric culture of excellence, collaboration, and continuous improvement across all departments.

    • Provide visionary leadership and mentorship to the operations team, empowering them to embrace AI technologies and drive professional development in this rapidly evolving field.
    • Serve as a prominent advocate for our AI-driven project in public-facing engagements, including events, conferences, and networking opportunities, showcasing our pioneering advancements in the AI landscape.

Qualifications:

    • 5+ years of experience in management-level roles within the tech industry.
    • A minimum of 2 years at any early-stage startup company, preferably in the AI or web3 spaces.
    • Proven track record of success in scaling operations and driving organizational growth in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
    • Strong understanding of the blockchain, AI, and digital identity landscapes.
    • Excellent strategic thinking, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
    • Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage with diverse stakeholders.
    • Ability to adapt to changing priorities and thrive in a rapidly evolving industry.

job_description:

Responsibilities

    • Actively participate in the design and delivery of the Group’s governance and controls strategy;
    • Support the embedding of management’s Group-wide Internal Control Environment (ICE) Framework, advising on Process Controls, Entity Level Controls, IT Application Controls and IT General Controls;
    • Lead internal readiness assessments for Service Organisation Control (SOC) 1 and 2 reports (both Type I and II), supporting the global business’ operations, reporting and compliance objectives;
    • Develop and deliver a first line management testing model, including the annual scoping approach and ongoing process / control design and operating effectiveness assessments;
    • Develop and manage an annual Group-wide system of control attestation program;
    • Support the implementation of AuditBoard as the Group’s integrated GRC tool, including OpsAudit and SOXHUB modules;
    • Build strong working relationships with the central functions and business units to ensure sufficient and effective controls are in place across key processes and applications;
    • Perform risk assessments and walkthroughs, supporting management in the preparation / updating of process flows, descriptions and risk control matrices in accordance with ICE criteria;
    • Identify potential gaps and support management in the design, monitoring and reporting of remediation plans to address any control issues;
    • Work closely with Internal Audit, Risk and Compliance to understand high risk areas, ensuring adequate assurance coverage across the three lines of defense; 
    • Serve as the Point of Contact and assume ongoing management responsibilities for the Group’s Market and Credit Risk policies; and
    • Assist with audit readiness, policy management and other special projects.

Requirements

    • Qualifications (must-haves):
    • Bachelor’s degree, CIA, or professional accounting designation (e.g. CPA, CGMA, ACA, ACCA);
    • Minimum of 10 years relevant technical experience (audit, internal controls, SOX);
    • Experience working in digital assets, financial services or tech sector;
    • Strong understanding of the COSO 2013 Internal Control - Integrated Framework;
    • Experience in the planning and delivery of SOC 1 and 2 reports (both Type I and Type II reports);
    • Experience working with Finance, Tech, Risk, Compliance and Internal Audit teams on continuous process and control improvements; and
    • Strong organizational, interpersonal and communication skills.
    • Qualifications (nice-to-haves):
    • Big 4 experience;
    • Familiarity with integrated GRC tools (e.g. AuditBoard);
    • Public company reporting experience; and
    • Experience working at crypto-native companies.

job_title: Technical Support Engineer / SL3 Application Owner
job_description:
Binance is the leading global blockchain ecosystem and cryptocurrency infrastructure provider whose suite of financial products includes the world’s largest digital-asset exchange. Our mission is to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.If you’re looking for a fast-paced, mission-driven organization where opportunities to learn and excel are endless, then Binance is the place for you.We are looking for a talented Technical Support Engineer / SL3 Application Owner to join our TechOps team.This is a pretty broad role that will involve investigating and resolving technical questions related to functioning of our ecosystem (Binance.com, Mobile Apps, etc), and other related duties.It will include close cooperation with our Customer Support, internal Dev/Infra teams, as well as other parties.

Responsibilities:

    • Provide technical support and handling urgent escalation from external or internal customers or users in production environment with high-volume of transaction traffic
    • Strong collaboration, communication and interaction with all stakeholders including customers, product manager, developer and management team
    • Analyse service ticket data, identify incident root cause, draft Root Cause Analysis (RCA) report and follow possible maintenance for system-level improvement
    • Work closely with product and developer teams in global offices, participate and follow up in iteration, release and roadmap planning timely
    • Very flexible with capability to prioritize multiple incidents and deadlines to facilitate well in a fast-paced, rapidly evolving organization
    • High responsibility in continuous improvement in service quality and efficiency
    • Ability to provide coaching, training, identification, optimization and documentation of the customer or business support processes

Requirements:

    • 4-8+ years of experience in similar roles - e.g. Technical Support Engineer, SL3 Engineer, Application Owner, TechOps Engineer, etc
    • Must have strong capabilities to identify, analyze and resolve problems logically and systematically
    • 3+ years Unix/Linux with shell scripting, etc
    • 2+ years databases experience (Oracle, MySQL)
    • 2+ years Web or App related project support experience with HTTP protocol, JavaScript, RESTful, Json, Web Service, TCP/IP, Linux/Unix
    • Understanding of software development methodologies and coding standards
    • Experience with software application debugging and troubleshooting

job_title: Web3 Young Talent - Smart Contract Security
job_description:
Binance is the leading global blockchain ecosystem and cryptocurrency infrastructure provider whose suite of financial products includes the world’s largest digital-asset exchange. Our mission is to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.If you’re looking for a fast-paced, mission-driven organization where opportunities to learn and excel are endless, then Binance is the place for you.This is a unique opportunity to contribute to the field and contribute to the blockchain community. You will work hand-in-hand with various talented workers from Binance on the cutting-edge of crypto to guard safety across many projects and systems. You will also coordinate with other teams aside from the security group, which could provide you an in-depth understanding of the crypto world.

Responsibilities

    • Perform a review analysis on newly disclosed vulnerabilities for smart contracts and summarize the root cause behind the exploits for early detection in the future.
    • Conduct security audits on both smart contracts and blockchains, and write high-quality audit reports.
    • Develop automated scanning and monitoring tools for smart contracts and blockchains.
    • Utilize scanning tools to detect vulnerabilities in online contracts and promptly issue risk warnings. 
    • Conduct post-mortem analyses on various hacking incidents, examining the causes, processes, and basic fund tracing.
    • Proactively identify on-chain risks, monitor and model emerging on-chain attack vector trends, and possess a solid understanding of on-chain security risks such as fraud and phishing.
    • Demonstrate a strong understanding of EVM-compatible blockchains and layer 2 solutions, and be familiar with DeFi design patterns.

Requirements

    • Currently enrolled or holding a bachelor's degree (or higher) in Computer Science or a related field.
    • Proficient in Smart Contract programming languages, such as Solidity, among others.
    • Basic understanding of common Smart Contract security vulnerabilities.
    • Basic understanding of blockchain and smart contract principles, experienced with reading Blockchain explorers. Well versed with the different types of hacks on smart contracts, and its common attack vectors.
    • Well versed with the different types of scams such as Wallet Drainers in the space and how to identify them.
    • Familiar with smart contract development testing, transaction analysis, and other tools.
    • Experienced in using VSCode, Git, or other version control applications.
    • Proficient in Python or another object-oriented programming language.
    • Fundamental knowledge of code analysis and program debugging.

Additional beneficial skills

    • Passionate about cryptocurrency / DeFi / smart contract / blockchain.
    • Basic knowledge of fuzz testing or static analysis.
    • Basic knowledge of detection, exploitation, and prevention of security vulnerabilities.
    • Experience in smart contracts development (e.g Foundry, HardHat, etc).
    • Experience in CTF or bug bounty programs (e.g. Hack The Box, WebGoat, etc).
    • Experience in Front-end development (React, Javascript, Typescript).
    • Experience in data mining and data analysis of on-chain data.
    • Have great interest in Binance, high work enthusiasm and responsibility, good and humble work attitude.

Binance is the leading global blockchain ecosystem and cryptocurrency infrastructure provider whose suite of financial products includes the world’s largest digital-asset exchange.
